Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Hong Kong. Please find the event details below:
Date: Tuesday, March 10, 2015 Time: Registration begins @ 9.15AM/Keynote begins @ 10.00AM/Session #1 begins @ 11.45AM/Session #2 begins @ 1.45PM/Session #3 begins @ 3.15PM Location: Admiralty Conference Center, Tower 1, Admiralty Centre, 18 Harcourt Rd, Admiralty, Hong Kong
{{my.Save The Date - Hong Kong:default=edit me}}
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
